comments: Bridges (CHA) turns toward Burks (NYK) and marginal body contact occurs as Burks drives into the lane.
Bridges (CHA) places his forearm to Burks' (NYK) back as he moves alongside Burks' path and marginal contact occurs after Burks' gather.
Bridges (CHA) establishes a wide screening position and initiates leg-to-leg contact with Walker (NYK) that affects his ability to defend.
Randle (NYK) jumps from point A to point B and initiates body contact with Bridges (CHA) during the driving shot attempt.
Hayward (CHA) makes clean contact with the ball as simultaneous incidental contact occurs with Randle's (NYK) arm during rebounding.
Randle (NYK) and Rozier (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Hayward (CHA) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Ball (CHA) cleanly deflects and intercepts the pass intended for Barrett (NYK).
Barrett (NYK) brushes Ball's (CHA) right arm and marginal contact occurs as he gains control of the ball.
Barrett (NYK) swipes down and initiates contact across Ball's (CHA) right arm after his gather.
Bridges (CHA) and Randle (NYK) engage and disengage with one another off-ball.
Bridges (CHA) turns and initiates contact with Randle (NYK), re-routing him on his way to the basket during the driving shot attempt.
Walker (NYK) cleanly intercepts the pass intended for Rozier (CHA).
Bridges (CHA) initiates contact across Randle's (NYK) left forearm and causes Randle to lose control of the ball as he starts his upward shooting motion.
Hayward (CHA) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact made with Barrett (NYK) before cleanly blocking the driving shot attempt.
Quickley (NYK) and Bridges (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Replay review of the out of bounds call pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Barrett (NYK) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Walker (NYK) commits a take foul on Ball (CHA).
Randle (NYK) firms up in his screening position in Ball's (CHA) path and absorbs the contact to his chest.
Bridges (CHA) cleanly blocks Walker's (NYK) driving shot attempt.
Randle (NYK) and Ball (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Walker (NYK) attempts to commit a take foul on Ball (CHA) and the contact is marginal.
